choices: Getting stared by the king zora and the other zoras

1.content:
I was sun bathing on the beach the day enjoying myself. As i as sun bathinng i nottced a strange gutiar just washed up along the shore. So i got up and took a look to see what it was. I got up to the shore line and the objedcet was a fish bone gutiar. I thought to myself self for a monent and i just realized it was the very same gutiar from the legend of Zelda majoras mask. So i picked up the gutiar and for some strange reason my hands started playing a note on it.
The song that i was playing sonded awfully familler. Just as i was finshed playing the song my body stared to fell strange. My skin started to change to a bluesish tone and my head started to change. I stared to grow Fins ( which looked exactly like zora links finns). Once the transformation was finnshed i collesped on the beach. Just then some fammiler sillouets came right to my new body and picked me up and took me away ( You already know who i am talking about here people). Is he allright a voice said. Dont know we found him collasied on the beach shore another voice said. Just the i stared to ragin connceinus and i got up. Oh my thank goodness you are awake. I looked to find out that the voice was princess ruto looking at me with worried eyes. I say yes but where am i. Why silly you are in Zora's domian. And we are going to get married toghether. WHAT! i said and the i faintted yet agian. After a while i reggend connicunes and to find out that i was...

info.description: As it says for the top the stroy starts off where i am at Turky point beach in canda but then i find a gutair and i played a song and something strange happens. And also i am 16 teen yeras old. Same with ruto but just use your immagationb. And also i have blond hair.
